name: Caves of Trash and Treasure
description:
Goblins have been terrorizing wealthy locals for months, taking many prizes including the Extremely Fragile Crystals.

While exploring, you found the caves where they hid their loot. Take the best treasure for yourself before someone else gets there first!

If only you had brought a larger bag...

The Caves of Trash and Treasure is a short roguelike where the aim is to escape with the most valuable items. However, you can only carry four. Will you take gems and expensive materials that could earn you a fortune, or tools that could save your life?

Created for the Seven-Day Roguelike Challenge 2018.
